title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-6.14 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-6.14 - Notification

State Regulations

Any person who owns or operates a bottled or bulk water facility must notify the State by telephone, facsimile (FAX) copy or other means when feasible, but no later than 24 hours of learning of the existence or potential existence of a violation of section
5-6.11
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-6.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
